Class RegistrationController

java.lang.Object
bto.Controllers.RegistrationController
public class RegistrationController extends Object
The RegistrationController class manages officer registrations for BTO housing projects. It provides functionality for creating, approving, rejecting, and retrieving officer registrations for projects.

This controller maintains a map of registrations indexed by officer NRIC to efficiently retrieve registrations for specific officers. It also handles updating project officer slots when registrations are approved.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegistrationController

      public RegistrationController()
      Default constructor for RegistrationController. Initializes an empty map to store officer registrations.

  • Method Details

    • registerOfficer

      public OfficerRegistration registerOfficer(HDBOfficer officer, Project project)
      Registers an officer for a project. Checks if the project has available officer slots before creating the registration.
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDBOfficer to register
      project - The Project to register for
      Returns:
      The created OfficerRegistration object, or null if no slots available

    • approveRegistration

      public boolean approveRegistration(OfficerRegistration registration)
      Approves an officer registration for a project. Updates the registration status, adds the project to the officer's assigned projects, and decreases the number of available officer slots for the project.
      Parameters:
      registration - The OfficerRegistration to approve
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if the registration is invalid

    • rejectRegistration

      public boolean rejectRegistration(OfficerRegistration registration)
      Rejects an officer registration for a project. Updates the registration status to "REJECTED".
      Parameters:
      registration - The OfficerRegistration to reject
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if the registration is invalid

    • viewRegistrationStatus

      public List<OfficerRegistration> viewRegistrationStatus(HDBOfficer officer)
      Retrieves all registrations for a specific officer.
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDBOfficer whose registrations to view
      Returns:
      List of OfficerRegistration objects for the specified officer, or an empty list if none found

    • getAllRegistrations

      public List<OfficerRegistration> getAllRegistrations()
      Retrieves all officer registrations in the system.
      Returns:
      List of all OfficerRegistration objects

    • updateProjectSlots

      public boolean updateProjectSlots(Project project)
      Updates the available officer slots for a project. Decrements the number of available slots by one if slots are available.
      Parameters:
      project - The Project to update
      Returns:
      true if slots were updated, false if no slots available

    • setRegistrations

      public void setRegistrations(List<OfficerRegistration> registrationList)
      Sets the registrations from a list of OfficerRegistration objects. Clears the existing map and rebuilds it using the officer NRIC as keys. This method is used for loading registrations from persistence.
      Parameters:
      registrationList - The list of OfficerRegistration objects to set
